page.title: 07Sizewell hall
page.content: Sizewell Hall is situated two miles from Leiston.At the present it is used as a Christian conference and holiday centre for people from East Anglia.The house is set back one hundred yards from the sea with its own stretch of private beach.Thirty acres of trees provide shelter from the strong east winds.there are thirty bedrooms on the first and second floors,a large conference room and other good sized rooms on the groundfloor.By the side of the Hall there are five cottges,one occupied by the caretakers Mr and Mrs Stafford. For holidays the Hall is used as a self catering centre.Groups have to cook their own meals and keep the place tidy and clean.Nearby is sizewell power station.
